task_description_list.task_description: Create a new e-mail to borje@baai.ac.cn with subject "Hello friend" and send it.
Open the junk folder and delete all messages in it, if any.
Open an e-mail from Börje in the inbox, reply to it with text "Got it. Thanks.", and click send.
Find the e-mail whose subject is “Urgent meeting” and open it.
Set up email forwarding for every email received to go to borje@baai.ac.cn.
Attach my AWS bill to an email. The bill is stored at Desktop/aws-bill.pdf. Don't send the e-mail.
